page.title: 13Leisure Surveys.
page.content: The first survey was on children aged 12. On Saturday mornings 70% watch television. Children enjoyed pop music and following the charts. The average time for tea was 5.05pm and the average time for bed was 9.40pm. 60% of the children go jogging and everyone enjoyed playing outside. For the second survey several people under 40 were interviewed about how they spent their leisure time. Here are our results: 6 read; 10 played sports; 14 watched T.V.; 8 go walking; 6 go camping; 5 visit relattions; 4 do gardening; 10 go to the pub; 4 go to discos; and 9 play on computers. We found that the most popular pastime was watching T.V. and videos.
